quiz.question: _________ gleam
quiz.explanation: gleam 闪光,月光闪光。The soft moonlight gleam illuminated the peaceful garden at night.柔和的月光闪光在夜晚照亮了宁静的花园。

quiz.question: _____ agleam
quiz.explanation: agleam 闪闪发光,剑闪闪发光。The knight's polished sword agleam in the sunlight as he raised it high.骑士抛光的剑在阳光下闪闪发光,当他高高举起它时。

quiz.question: ream __ _____
quiz.explanation: ream 令,一令纸。The office ordered a fresh ream of paper for the busy printing department.办公室为繁忙的印刷部门订购了一令新纸。

quiz.question: ___ slipstream
quiz.explanation: slipstream 尾流,喷气机尾流。The smaller plane flew in the jet slipstream to conserve fuel.小飞机在喷气机尾流中飞行以节省燃料。

quiz.question: _____ sham
quiz.explanation: sham 赝品,廉价赝品。The antique dealer exposed the painting as a cheap sham forgery.古董商揭露这幅画是廉价赝品伪造品。

quiz.question: ___ bedlam
quiz.explanation: bedlam 混乱,疯狂的混乱。The classroom descended into mad bedlam when the teacher left the room.当老师离开房间时,教室陷入了疯狂的混乱。

quiz.question: roam ______
quiz.explanation: roam 漫游,自由地漫游。Wild animals could roam freely across the vast nature preserve.野生动物可以在广阔的自然保护区自由地漫游。

quiz.question: cram ___ ____
quiz.explanation: cram 临时抱佛脚,为考试临时抱佛脚。Desperate students would cram for exam the night before finals.绝望的学生会在期末考试前一晚为考试临时抱佛脚。

quiz.question: deem _________
quiz.explanation: deem 认为,认为必要。The committee would deem necessary additional safety measures at the plant.委员会会认为工厂需要额外的安全措施。

quiz.question: teem ____ ____
quiz.explanation: teem 充满,充满生命。The coral reef would teem with life in every colorful crevice.珊瑚礁的每个彩色缝隙中都充满生命。

quiz.question: proclaim _______
quiz.explanation: proclaim 宣告,宣告胜利。The general stood proudly to proclaim victory after the decisive battle.将军在决定性的战斗后自豪地站着宣告胜利。

quiz.question: exclaim ______
quiz.explanation: exclaim 大声喊叫,大声喊叫。The excited winner would exclaim loudly upon receiving the prestigious award.兴奋的获奖者在获得著名奖项时会大声喊叫。

quiz.question: maim ______
quiz.explanation: maim 使残废,使受害者残废。The landmine explosion would maim victim causing permanent injuries.地雷爆炸会使受害者残废,造成永久性伤害。

quiz.question: skim ____
quiz.explanation: skim 撇去,撇去牛奶的奶油。The dairy worker would skim milk to remove cream for butter production.奶品工人会撇去牛奶的奶油用于黄油生产。

quiz.question: brim ____
quiz.explanation: brim 边缘,满到边缘。The glass was filled brim full with sparkling champagne for the toast.杯子里装满了边缘的起泡香槟用于祝酒。

quiz.question: fathom _____
quiz.explanation: fathom 测深,测量深度。Sailors used weighted lines to fathom depth of uncharted waters.水手用加重的线来测量未知水域的深度。

quiz.question: loom _____
quiz.explanation: loom 隐约显现,大大显现。Dark storm clouds began to loom large on the distant horizon.黑暗的暴风云开始在远处的地平线上大大显现。

quiz.question: ____ gloom
quiz.explanation: gloom 忧郁,深深的忧郁。The family fell into deep gloom after hearing the tragic news.家人在听到悲惨消息后陷入深深的忧郁。

quiz.question: zoom __
quiz.explanation: zoom 放大,放大。The photographer would zoom in to capture tiny details of the flower.摄影师会放大以捕捉花朵的微小细节。

quiz.question: bosom ______
quiz.explanation: bosom 知心的,知心朋友。She had been my bosom friend since childhood sharing all secrets.她从童年起就是我的知心朋友,分享所有秘密。

quiz.question: ______ blossom
quiz.explanation: blossom 花朵,春天的花朵。Beautiful cherry spring blossoms covered the trees in delicate pink petals.美丽的樱花春天花朵以精致的粉红色花瓣覆盖着树木。

quiz.question: accustom _______
quiz.explanation: accustom 使习惯,使自己习惯。New immigrants must accustom oneself to different cultural customs gradually.新移民必须逐渐使自己习惯不同的文化习俗。

quiz.question: _____ forearm
quiz.explanation: forearm 前臂,人类前臂。The human forearm contains two bones called the radius and ulna.人类前臂包含两块骨头,称为桡骨和尺骨。

quiz.question: __________ smarm
quiz.explanation: smarm 谄媚,虚伪的谄媚。The politician's insincere smarm made voters distrust his campaign promises.这位政治家虚伪的谄媚使选民不信任他的竞选承诺。

quiz.question: ___ swarm
quiz.explanation: swarm 群,蜜蜂群。A massive bee swarm descended on the garden causing panic among visitors.一大群蜜蜂降落在花园上,引起游客恐慌。

quiz.question: squirm _____________
quiz.explanation: squirm 扭动,不舒服地扭动。The guilty witness would squirm uncomfortably under the prosecutor's intense questioning.有罪的证人会在检察官激烈的质问下不舒服地扭动。

quiz.question: deform ____
quiz.explanation: deform 使变形,使身体变形。The severe accident would deform body parts requiring extensive surgery.严重的事故会使身体部位变形,需要大量手术。

quiz.question: _______ sarcasm
quiz.explanation: sarcasm 讽刺,尖刻的讽刺。His cutting sarcasm wounded people's feelings despite being meant as humor.他尖刻的讽刺伤害了人们的感情,尽管是作为幽默的意思。

quiz.question: ____ chasm
quiz.explanation: chasm 深渊,深深的深渊。A deep chasm separated the two cliffs making crossing extremely dangerous.一个深深的深渊分隔了两个悬崖,使穿越极其危险。

quiz.question: ______ spasm
quiz.explanation: spasm 痉挛,肌肉痉挛。The athlete experienced a painful muscle spasm during the marathon race.运动员在马拉松比赛中经历了痛苦的肌肉痉挛。

quiz.question: _______ act
quiz.explanation: heroism 英雄主义,英雄行为。The firefighter's heroism act saved many lives from the burning building.消防员的英雄行为从燃烧的建筑中拯救了许多生命。

quiz.question: _______ rheumatism
quiz.explanation: rheumatism 风湿病,慢性风湿病。The elderly suffer from chronic rheumatism causing joint pain and stiffness.老年人患有慢性风湿病,引起关节疼痛和僵硬。

quiz.question: __________ policy
quiz.explanation: favoritism 偏袒,偏袒政策。The manager's obvious favoritism policy created resentment among other employees.经理明显的偏袒政策在其他员工中造成了怨恨。

quiz.question: _______ paroxysm
quiz.explanation: paroxysm 突发,剧烈的突发。The patient experienced a violent paroxysm of coughing during the examination.病人在检查期间经历了剧烈的咳嗽突发。

quiz.question: ____ scum
quiz.explanation: scum 浮渣,池塘浮渣。Green pond scum covered the stagnant water's surface in summer.绿色的池塘浮渣在夏天覆盖着停滞水面。

quiz.question: ____ pandemonium
quiz.explanation: pandemonium 大混乱,狂野的大混乱。Wild pandemonium erupted when the home team scored the winning goal.当主队打进制胜进球时,爆发了狂野的大混乱。

quiz.question: ______ hoodlum
quiz.explanation: hoodlum 流氓,街头流氓。The dangerous street hoodlum terrorized the neighborhood with violent crimes.危险的街头流氓用暴力犯罪恐吓邻里。

quiz.question: ____ glum
quiz.explanation: glum 忧郁的,看起来忧郁。After the defeat, the team members would look glum and disappointed.失败后,队员们看起来忧郁和失望。

quiz.question: ____ candelabrum
quiz.explanation: candelabrum 枝形烛台,金枝形烛台。The ornate gold candelabrum held seven candles for the ceremony.华丽的金枝形烛台为仪式举着七根蜡烛。

quiz.question: _____ scrum
quiz.explanation: scrum 并列争球,橄榄球并列争球。The forwards formed a tight rugby scrum to contest for ball possession.前锋形成了一个紧密的橄榄球并列争球以争夺球权。

quiz.question: ____ turban
quiz.explanation: turban 头巾,丝绸头巾。The dignified elder wore an elegant silk turban as traditional attire.尊贵的长者穿着优雅的丝绸头巾作为传统服装。

quiz.question: ____ toboggan
quiz.explanation: toboggan 雪橇,乘雪橇。Children love to ride toboggan down snowy hills during winter vacation.孩子们喜欢在寒假期间乘雪橇滑下雪山。

quiz.question: ____ cardigan
quiz.explanation: cardigan 开襟羊毛衫,羊毛开襟羊毛衫。She buttoned up her cozy wool cardigan against the chilly evening air.她扣上舒适的羊毛开襟羊毛衫以抵御寒冷的晚间空气。

quiz.question: _________ eyes
quiz.explanation: reptilian 爬行动物般的,爬行动物般的眼睛。The villain was described as having cold reptilian eyes without emotion.反派被描述为有冷酷的爬行动物般的眼睛,没有情感。

quiz.question: ______ disciplinarian
quiz.explanation: disciplinarian 纪律严明者,严格的纪律严明者。The strict disciplinarian teacher demanded perfect behavior from all students.这位严格的纪律严明的教师要求所有学生行为完美。

quiz.question: _____ horseman
quiz.explanation: horseman 骑手,勇敢的骑手。The brave horseman charged fearlessly into battle leading his troops.勇敢的骑手无畏地冲锋陷阵,带领他的部队。

quiz.question: ______ hangman
quiz.explanation: hangman 刽子手,公开处决的刽子手。The public hangman carried out executions in the town square centuries ago.公开处决的刽子手几个世纪前在城镇广场执行死刑。

quiz.question: ____ yeoman
quiz.explanation: yeoman 自耕农,自由的自耕农。In medieval England, a free yeoman owned his land and owed no feudal service.在中世纪英格兰,自由的自耕农拥有自己的土地,不欠封建服务。

quiz.question: ________ barman
quiz.explanation: barman 酒保,友好的酒保。The friendly barman served drinks and listened to customers' problems patiently.友好的酒保端上饮料并耐心倾听顾客的问题。

quiz.question: ________ merman
quiz.explanation: merman 人鱼,神话中的人鱼。Sailors told tales of encountering a mythical merman in deep ocean waters.水手讲述在深海中遇到神话中的人鱼的故事。

quiz.question: _____ talisman
quiz.explanation: talisman 护身符,幸运的护身符。The warrior wore a lucky talisman around his neck for protection.战士在脖子上戴着幸运的护身符以获得保护。

quiz.question: ________ piece
quiz.explanation: chessman 棋子,国际象棋棋子。The carved ivory chessman piece was a valuable antique collector's item.雕刻的象牙国际象棋棋子是珍贵的古董收藏品。

quiz.question: ________ primate
quiz.explanation: nonhuman 非人类的,非人类的灵长类动物。Scientists studied nonhuman primates to understand evolutionary biology better.科学家研究非人类的灵长类动物以更好地了解进化生物学。

quiz.question: moan ______
quiz.explanation: moan 呻吟,轻声呻吟。The injured patient would moan softly from pain despite receiving medication.受伤的病人尽管接受了药物治疗,仍会因疼痛而轻声呻吟。

quiz.question: bemoan ____
quiz.explanation: bemoan 哀叹,哀叹命运。The defeated king would bemoan fate that led to his kingdom's downfall.被击败的国王会哀叹导致他王国垮台的命运。

quiz.question: roan _____
quiz.explanation: roan 杂色的,杂色的马。The beautiful roan horse had a coat mixing white and dark hairs.美丽的杂色马有混合白色和深色毛发的毛皮。

quiz.question: groan __ ____
quiz.explanation: groan 呻吟,痛苦地呻吟。The wounded soldier would groan in pain waiting for medical assistance.受伤的士兵会痛苦地呻吟等待医疗援助。

quiz.question: ____ __ saucepan
quiz.explanation: saucepan 平底锅,在平底锅里煮。The chef would cook in saucepan the delicate sauce over low heat.厨师会在平底锅里用小火煮精致的酱汁。

quiz.question: _______ brush
quiz.explanation: dustpan 簸箕,簸箕刷。She used a dustpan brush to sweep up broken glass from the floor.她用簸箕刷从地板上扫起破碎的玻璃。

quiz.question: ___ suntan
quiz.explanation: suntan 晒黑,日光晒黑。After the beach vacation, she returned with a golden sun suntan.海滩度假后,她带着金色的日光晒黑回来了。

quiz.question: ________ tartan
quiz.explanation: tartan 格子呢,苏格兰格子呢。The traditional Scottish tartan pattern represents different Highland clans.传统的苏格兰格子呢图案代表不同的高地氏族。

quiz.question: deaden ____
quiz.explanation: deaden 减轻,减轻疼痛。The anesthetic would deaden pain during the dental procedure.麻醉剂会在牙科手术期间减轻疼痛。

quiz.question: leaden _____
quiz.explanation: leaden 铅灰色的,铅灰色的天空。Dark leaden skies threatened rain throughout the gloomy afternoon.黑暗的铅灰色天空在阴郁的下午威胁着要下雨。

quiz.question: _________ ship
quiz.explanation: overladen 超载的,超载的船。The dangerously overladen ship sat low in the water risking capsizing.危险的超载船低低地坐在水中,有倾覆的危险。

quiz.question: redden ______
quiz.explanation: redden 变红,脸颊变红。Embarrassment would redden cheeks making the shy girl look away.尴尬会使脸颊变红,让害羞的女孩移开视线。

quiz.question: ___________ people
quiz.explanation: downtrodden 被压迫的,被压迫的人民。The revolutionary leader championed rights of downtrodden people everywhere.革命领袖在各地倡导被压迫人民的权利。

quiz.question: sodden _______
quiz.explanation: sodden 湿透的,湿透的衣服。After the rainstorm, her sodden clothes clung uncomfortably to her body.暴风雨过后,她湿透的衣服不舒服地贴在她的身体上。

quiz.question: ________ spleen
quiz.explanation: spleen 脾脏,肿大的脾脏。The doctor detected an enlarged spleen during the physical examination.医生在体检期间发现了肿大的脾脏。

quiz.question: ___ careen
quiz.explanation: careen 猛冲,汽车猛冲。The out-of-control car careen wildly down the steep hill.失控的汽车猛冲疯狂地冲下陡峭的山坡。

quiz.question: preen ________
quiz.explanation: preen 整理,整理羽毛。The peacock would preen feathers carefully to maintain its magnificent display.孔雀会仔细整理羽毛以保持其华丽的展示。

quiz.question: ____ tureen
quiz.explanation: tureen 汤碗,汤碗。The hostess brought a steaming soup tureen to the dinner table.女主人把一个冒着热气的汤碗端到餐桌上。

quiz.question: stiffen ____
quiz.explanation: stiffen 变僵硬,身体变僵硬。Fear would stiffen body making movement difficult during the emergency.恐惧会使身体变僵硬,在紧急情况下使移动变得困难。

quiz.question: ashen ____
quiz.explanation: ashen 苍白的,苍白的脸。His ashen face revealed the shock of receiving the terrible news.他苍白的脸揭示了收到可怕消息的震惊。

quiz.question: earthen ___
quiz.explanation: earthen 陶制的,陶罐。The traditional earthen pot kept water cool in the summer heat.传统的陶罐在夏季炎热中保持水的凉爽。

quiz.question: oaken _____
quiz.explanation: oaken 橡木的,橡木桌。The massive oaken table had been in the family for generations.这张巨大的橡木桌已在家族中传承了几代人。

quiz.question: reawaken ________
quiz.explanation: reawaken 重新唤起,重新唤起兴趣。The documentary would reawaken interest in ancient civilizations among viewers.这部纪录片会在观众中重新唤起对古代文明的兴趣。

quiz.question: slacken _____
quiz.explanation: slacken 放慢,放慢速度。The driver would slacken speed when approaching the sharp curve ahead.司机在接近前方急转弯时会放慢速度。

quiz.question: _______ fern
quiz.explanation: bracken 蕨类,蕨类植物。Dense bracken ferns covered the forest floor in thick green growth.茂密的蕨类植物以厚厚的绿色生长覆盖着森林地面。
stricken 受灾的,疾病缠身的。The disease-stricken village desperately needed medical supplies and doctors.疾病缠身的村庄迫切需要医疗用品和医生。

quiz.question: sicken _______
quiz.explanation: sicken 生病,迅速生病。The contaminated food would sicken quickly anyone who consumed it.受污染的食物会使任何食用它的人迅速生病。

quiz.question: silken ______
quiz.explanation: silken 丝绸般的,丝线。The spider spun delicate silken thread to construct its intricate web.蜘蛛纺出精致的丝线以构建其复杂的网。

quiz.question: ________ rule
quiz.explanation: unspoken 不言而喻的,不言而喻的规则。There was an unspoken rule that everyone respected in the community.社区中有一条每个人都尊重的不言而喻的规则。

quiz.question: _________ critic
quiz.explanation: outspoken 直言不讳的,直言不讳的批评家。The outspoken critic fearlessly challenged government policies in public forums.直言不讳的批评家在公共论坛上无畏地挑战政府政策。

quiz.question: ________ record
quiz.explanation: unbroken 未被打破的,未被打破的记录。The athlete maintained an unbroken record of victories throughout the season.运动员在整个赛季中保持着未被打破的胜利记录。

quiz.question: ___________ loser
quiz.explanation: crestfallen 垂头丧气的,垂头丧气的失败者。The crestfallen loser walked slowly off the field after the defeat.垂头丧气的失败者在失败后缓慢地走下场地。

quiz.question: _______ ankle
quiz.explanation: swollen 肿胀的,肿胀的脚踝。The injured player's swollen ankle required ice and elevation treatment.受伤球员肿胀的脚踝需要冰敷和抬高治疗。

quiz.question: ______ mood
quiz.explanation: sullen 闷闷不乐的,闷闷不乐的情绪。The teenager's sullen mood made family conversation difficult at dinner.青少年闷闷不乐的情绪使晚餐时的家庭对话变得困难。

quiz.question: _________ limb
quiz.explanation: misshapen 畸形的,畸形的肢体。The birth defect resulted in a misshapen limb requiring surgical correction.先天缺陷导致畸形的肢体需要手术矫正。

quiz.question: deepen _______
quiz.explanation: deepen 加深,加深谜团。Each new clue would only deepen mystery surrounding the strange disappearance.每一个新线索只会加深围绕奇怪失踪的谜团。

quiz.question: ______ fence
quiz.explanation: pigpen 猪圈,猪圈栅栏。The farmer repaired the broken pigpen fence to keep livestock secure.农民修理了破损的猪圈栅栏以保证家畜安全。

quiz.question: dampen __________
quiz.explanation: dampen 减弱,减弱热情。The bad weather would dampen enthusiasm for the outdoor festival.恶劣的天气会减弱对户外节日的热情。

quiz.question: straighten __
quiz.explanation: straighten 弄直,弄直。The teacher told students to straighten up and pay attention in class.老师告诉学生在课堂上弄直身体并注意听讲。

quiz.question: heighten _________
quiz.explanation: heighten 提高,提高意识。The campaign aims to heighten awareness about environmental conservation issues.该运动旨在提高对环境保护问题的意识。

quiz.question: lighten ____
quiz.explanation: lighten 减轻,减轻负担。Volunteers helped lighten load by carrying supplies for the elderly hikers.志愿者通过为年长徒步旅行者搬运物资来帮助减轻负担。

quiz.question: frighten ________
quiz.explanation: frighten 吓唬,吓唬孩子。The Halloween decorations would frighten children walking past the house.万圣节装饰会吓唬走过房子的孩子。

quiz.question: hearten __________
quiz.explanation: hearten 鼓舞,鼓舞支持者。The candidate's speech would hearten supporters before the important election.候选人的演讲会在重要选举前鼓舞支持者。

quiz.question: hasten _________
quiz.explanation: hasten 加速,加速离开。The approaching storm would hasten departure of the sailing expedition.即将到来的风暴会加速航海探险队的离开。

quiz.question: glisten ____ ___
quiz.explanation: glisten 闪光,露珠闪光。Morning grass would glisten with dew in the early sunlight.早晨的草在清晨的阳光下会露珠闪光。

quiz.question: christen ____
quiz.explanation: christen 命名,为船命名。The queen would ceremonially christen ship by breaking champagne on its hull.女王会通过在船体上打破香槟来正式为船命名。

quiz.question: smitten ____ ____
quiz.explanation: smitten 被迷住,被爱情迷住。The young Romeo was completely smitten with love for Juliet.年轻的罗密欧完全被对朱丽叶的爱情迷住了。
